name: Wario no Mori: Bakushō Version
overview: Wario no Mori: Bakushō Version (「ワリオの森　爆笑バージョン」) is a Downloadable game for the Satellaview. The game is a pseudo-sequel to the earlier-broadcast Wario's Woods and Wario no Mori Futatabi (「ワリオの森再び」) featuring the vocal talents of Japanese comedy duo, Bakushō Mondai.
